mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM productInquiry WHERE productCode = #{productCode} AND showQuestion = 1

SELECT pi.inquiryId, pi.memberId, m2.name, secret, title, content, regDate, answerId, mm2.name answerName, answer, answerDate, showQuestion, pi.productCode FROM productInquiry pi JOIN member2 m2 ON pi.memberId = m2.memberId LEFT OUTER JOIN member2 mm2 ON answerId = mm2.memberId WHERE pi.productCode = #{productCode} AND showQuestion = 1 ORDER BY pi.inquiryId DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO productInquiry(inquiryId, productCode, memberId, secret, title, content, showQuestion, regDate) VALUES(productInquiry_seq.NEXTVAL, #{productCode}, #{memberId}, #{secret}, #{title}, #{content}, 1, SYSDATE)
